issue.title: build: Update `qt` package up to 5.15.10
issue.body:
The Qt 5.15.10 contains at least two important for us fixes:
- https://github.com/qt/qtbase/commit/8bb90ab760310c9bc82b6ecbe068532fcb4e7822, which allows us to drop the [`dont_hardcode_x86_64.patch`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/fd8ab08558ccfb62f2d0a64d2d0d4dcefba977bc/depends/patches/qt/dont_hardcode_x86_64.patch)
- https://github.com/qt/qtbase/commit/df08a21fa4e7139d46ec68bcf264c922789c4f3a, which addresses https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28349#issuecomment-1743519614

Guix builds:
```
x86_64
6e7e04a5c1e504470e5d21d53c3cbec31ec72f6849bae2724de745b5ff61dae0  guix-build-a41c0456cdfd/output/aarch64-linux-gnu/SHA256SUMS.part
```

events.body:
ACK 848eec09363d1ba8198376eb9654b1a69e3541aa.

I've backported an upstream fix locally and got the same patch.

Tested on:
- macOS Ventura 13.6 (22G120, M1) + Xcode 15.0
- macOS Sonoma 14.0 (23A344, M1) + Xcode 15.0

issue.title: [25.1] Final backports
issue.body:
